Overview.name: Overview0
Overview.content:
OpenCms stores for each schema element a language specific value. By default, each of the language specific values can differ from the others.

Using the <synchronization> node in the XSD, it can be enforced that the value of a schema element is the same for each language - it is language independent. If a value is altered in one language, the altered value is stored for all languages at least if you use a content editor and do not edit the source directly.

Teaser.name: Teaser0
Teaser.content: The values of content elements can differ for different languages by default. But you can force the same value for each language. Here you learn how.
